item.description:
FREEDOM FEST in Weston on Sunday, May 24th 2:00pm. 16 Briar Oak Drive,
Weston, Connecticut. LIVE MUSIC !! BRING a chair or blanket and a pot luck
dish (organic salads/vegetarian dish would be ideal to compliment the
barbecue!). This is your chance to mingle with those at the forefront of
Connecticut's freedom movement in a celebratory setting. Contact: Rosie
(203) 866-8282
Email rosie@naturalneighborhood.com with your questions. "Price of
admission: SIGN THE PETITION!"

Vir-truly yours,

Rosie Haas
Natural Neighborhood, LLC
(203) 866-8282
http://www.superfoodc...
http://www.naturalnei...
http://www.backofwood...
item.name: Freedom Fest in Weston, CT
